STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Play with the top card of your library revealed.
Jouez avec la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque révélée.
Juega mostrando la primera carta de tu biblioteca.
Die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ist offen.
Gioca con la prima carta del tuo grimorio rivelata.
あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを公開したままプレイする。
당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 공개한 채로 게임을 진행한다.
Играйте с открытой верхней картой вашей библиотеки.
Jogue com o card do topo de seu grimório revelado.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local player = Object():GetController() if player ~= nil then local top = player:Library_GetNth(0) if top ~= nil then player:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Bool_Set( PLAYER_CHARACTERISTIC_PLAY_WITH_TOP_CARD_OF_LIBRARY_REVEALED, 1 ) end end

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: As long as the top card of your library is black, Vampire Nocturnus and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.
Tant que la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque est noire, le Nocturnus vampire et les autres créatures Vampire que vous contrôlez gagnent +2/+1 et ont le vol.
Mientras la primera carta de tu biblioteca sea negra, el Nócturnus vampiro y las otras criaturas Vampiro que controlas obtienen +2/+1 y tienen la habilidad de volar.
Solange die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek schwarz ist, erhalten der Vampir der Nacht und andere Vampir-Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, +2/+1 und haben Flugfähigkeit.
Fintanto che la prima carta del tuo grimorio è nera, il Vampiro Notturno e le altre creature Vampiro che controlli prendono +2/+1 e hanno volare.
あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードが黒であるかぎり、吸血鬼の夜侯とあなたがコントロールする他の吸血鬼・クリーチャーは＋２/＋１の修整を受けるとともに飛行を持つ。
당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드가 흑색인 한, 밤을 지배하는 흡혈귀와 당신이 조종하는 다른 흡혈귀 생물들은 +2/+1을 받고 비행 능력을 얻는다.
Пока верхняя карта вашей библиотеки — черная, Вампир-Ноктурнус и другие существа-Вампиры под вашим контролем получают +2/+1 и имеют Полет.
Enquanto o card do topo de seu grimório for preto, Vampiro Nocturnus e as outras criaturas do tipo Vampiro que você controla receberão +2/+1 e terão voar.
STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetSubType():Test( CREATURE_TYPE_VAMPIRE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetPlayer() == Object():GetPlayer())
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if Object():GetPlayer():Library_GetNth(0) ~= nil then if Object():GetPlayer():Library_GetNth(0):GetColour():Test( COLOUR_BLACK ) ~= 0 then if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Power_Add( 2 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end end end end

if Object():GetPlayer():Library_GetNth(0) ~= nil then if Object():GetPlayer():Library_GetNth(0):GetColour():Test( COLOUR_BLACK ) ~= 0 then local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if filtered_obj ~= nil then filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FLYING, 1 ) end end end
